name: slashmd-monorepo
description: SlashMD - Notion-like Markdown editor for VS Code

scripts.build:packages: pnpm --filter md-mapper build && pnpm --filter webview-ui build && pnpm --filter extension-host build
scripts.dev: pnpm --filter md-mapper dev & pnpm --filter webview-ui dev & pnpm --filter extension-host dev
scripts.package: pnpm build && cd packages/extension-host && pnpm package

author: SlashMD Team
